leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-谱学解析与表征生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→峰识别→指认→定量→报告

unit.unit_name: 谱图预处理/峰检测/去噪

queries: [WEB] open source spectroscopy signal processing github

tools.name: BoxSERS
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for processing and analyzing vibrational spectra (Raman, SERS, FTIR)
tools.detailed_description: BoxSERS is a Python package designed for the processing and analysis of vibrational spectra, including Raman, SERS, and FTIR data. It provides functionality for baseline subtraction, smoothing, normalization, and peak detection, facilitating the extraction of chemical information from spectral datasets.

tools.name: SpectroMap
tools.one_line_profile: Peak detection algorithm using constellation maps for signal analysis
tools.detailed_description: SpectroMap is a peak detection tool that utilizes a constellation map approach to identify peaks in signals. It is designed to handle spectral data and provide robust peak identification capabilities.

tools.name: NMRProcFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive GUI for 1D NMR metabolomics spectra processing
tools.detailed_description: NMRProcFlow is an open-source software that provides a graphical user interface for the processing and visualization of 1D NMR metabolomics data. It facilitates spectral alignment, baseline correction, and peak integration, specifically tailored for metabolomics workflows.

tools.name: Risa
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing ISA-tab metadata and data into Bioconductor structures
tools.detailed_description: Risa is an R package that serves as a bridge between the ISA-tab metadata format and Bioconductor data structures. It allows for the parsing of ISA-tab files and processing of associated mass spectrometry data into xcmsSet objects for further metabolomics or proteomics analysis.

tools.name: vg-beat-detectors
tools.one_line_profile: Fast R-peak detectors for ECG based on Visibility Graphs
tools.detailed_description: vg-beat-detectors provides fast and sample-accurate algorithms for detecting R-peaks in electrocardiogram (ECG) signals using Visibility Graphs. It offers an alternative to traditional signal processing methods for heart rate variability analysis.

tools.name: ampdLib
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Automatic Multiscale Peak Detection (AMPD) algorithm
tools.detailed_description: ampdLib is a Python library implementing the Automatic Multiscale Peak Detection (AMPD) algorithm. It is designed for robust peak detection in periodic and quasi-periodic signals, useful in various scientific signal processing tasks.

tools.name: LumiSpy
tools.one_line_profile: HyperSpy extension for luminescence spectroscopy data analysis
tools.detailed_description: LumiSpy is an extension for the HyperSpy library, specifically designed for the analysis of luminescence spectroscopy data. It provides tools for handling, processing, and analyzing multidimensional luminescence datasets.

tools.name: nmrkit
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices for NMR data processing and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of microservices designed to simplify NMR data processing and analysis, developed by NFDI4Chem.

tools.name: nmrpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for processing NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python module dedicated to the processing and analysis of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectra.

tools.name: LFMF
tools.one_line_profile: Low Frequency / Medium Frequency Propagation Model
tools.detailed_description: C++ implementation of the NTIA/ITS Low Frequency / Medium Frequency (LF/MF) Propagation Model for predicting transmission loss.

tools.name: OpenMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software for mass spectrometry data processing
tools.detailed_description: A powerful, open-source software library and framework for the processing and analysis of mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: Cardiac-frecuency-and-ECG-signal-denoising-by-EEMD
tools.one_line_profile: ECG signal denoising and R peak detection
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB implementation for ECG signal denoising using Ensemble Empirical Mode Decomposition (EEMD) and R peak detection using Hilbert Transform.

tools.name: PyZEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical calculation of zeros of analytic functions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for finding zeros, poles, and residues of holomorphic and meromorphic functions, successor to the ZEAL Fortran package.

tools.name: BaselineRemoval
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline removal for Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to perform baseline removal, correction, and subtraction for Raman spectra using algorithms like Modpoly and Zhang fit.

tools.name: TNO-DECO
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing for GC-MS Data
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB code for preprocessing Gas Chromatography Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) data, developed by TNO.

tools.name: FLARE
tools.one_line_profile: RNA edit detection and peak calling
tools.detailed_description: Software for RNA edit detection (SAILOR) and peak calling (FLARE) from the Yeo Lab.

tools.name: peak-detector
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal peak detection for physiological signals
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for multimodal peak detection using ECG, ABP, PPG, or SV signals.

tools.name: gram_savitzky_golay
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of Savitzky-Golay filtering based on Gram polynomials
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient C++ library for smoothing and differentiating data using Savitzky-Golay filters, utilizing Gram polynomials for numerical stability and performance.

tools.name: sgsmooth
tools.one_line_profile: C++ Implementation of Savitzky-Golay filters
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing an implementation of the Savitzky-Golay smoothing filter, suitable for preprocessing spectral or time-series data.

tools.name: peakdetect
tools.one_line_profile: Simple peak detection algorithm in Python
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python module for detecting peaks and valleys in time-series data, useful for basic spectral or signal analysis.

tools.name: RamanSPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for integrative Raman spectroscopy data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package designed for the analysis of Raman spectroscopy data, offering tools for preprocessing, processing, and visualizing Raman spectra.

tools.name: sdrf-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: SDRF file validator and converter for proteomics/genomics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A tool to validate Sample and Data Relationship Format (SDRF) files and convert them into configuration files for various data analysis pipelines in proteomics and multi-omics.

tools.name: ChemoSpec
tools.one_line_profile: R functions for the chemometric analysis of spectra
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R functions for top-down exploratory data analysis of spectral data, including NMR, IR, and Raman, supporting plotting, PCA, and HCA.

tools.name: PTXQC
tools.one_line_profile: Quality Control pipeline for Proteomics results from MaxQuant
tools.detailed_description: An R-based Quality Control (QC) pipeline that generates comprehensive QC reports for proteomics data analyzed with MaxQuant.

tools.name: rampy
tools.one_line_profile: Python software for spectral data processing (IR, Raman, XAS)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library containing functions for processing spectroscopic data, including baseline correction, smoothing, resampling, and peak fitting, suitable for Raman, IR, and XAS.

tools.name: nmrium
tools.one_line_profile: React component to display and process NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool and React component for visualizing, processing, and assigning Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectra directly in the browser.

tools.name: PeakBot
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based peak detection for LC-HRMS data
tools.detailed_description: A machine-learning based tool for the detection of chromatographic and m/z profile-mode peaks in Liquid Chromatography-High Resolution Mass Spectrometry (LC-HRMS) data.

tools.name: peaks-detection
tools.one_line_profile: C library for detecting peaks and valleys in digital signals
tools.detailed_description: A C implementation for identifying peaks and valleys in sampled digital signals, applicable to various signal processing tasks including spectroscopy.

tools.name: spectrum
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Analysis library in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for spectral analysis, implementing methods based on Fourier transform and parametric methods (e.g., Yule-Walker, BURG, MA, ARMA) for power spectral density estimation.

tools.name: DeepeR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning enabled Raman spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for the classification and analysis of Raman spectroscopy data, enabling automated identification of samples.

tools.name: GEE_TimeSeries
tools.one_line_profile: Google Earth Engine time series processing with Savitzky-Golay filter
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing time series data within Google Earth Engine, specifically implementing Savitzky-Golay smoothing for remote sensing data analysis.

tools.name: pybaselines
tools.one_line_profile: Library of algorithms for baseline correction of experimental data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library providing various algorithms for baseline correction of spectroscopic and experimental data, including polynomial, spline, and morphological methods.

tools.name: findpeaks
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of peaks and valleys in 1D vectors or 2D arrays
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for detecting peaks and valleys in 1D and 2D data, with support for interpolation, filtering, and topology-based peak detection.

tools.name: sgolay2
tools.one_line_profile: Two-dimensional Savitzky-Golay filter
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Savitzky-Golay filter for two-dimensional data, useful for smoothing images or 2D spectral data.

tools.name: SpectralMultivariateCalibration
tools.one_line_profile: Partial Least Squares implementation for spectral calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Partial Least Squares (PLS) regression, specifically designed for multivariate calibration in spectral analysis.

tools.name: indigo
tools.one_line_profile: SNV and InDel Discovery in Sanger Chromatogram traces
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the discovery of Single Nucleotide Variants (SNVs) and Insertions/Deletions (InDels) in chromatogram traces obtained from Sanger sequencing of PCR products.

tools.name: tracy
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Sanger Chromatogram trace files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for basecalling, alignment, assembly, and deconvolution of Sanger chromatogram trace files, supporting various file formats like AB1 and SCF.

tools.name: Monocle
tools.one_line_profile: Monoisotopic peak and accurate precursor m/z detection in shotgun proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the Gygi Lab for accurate monoisotopic peak detection and precursor m/z estimation in shotgun proteomics experiments, improving identification rates.

tools.name: PeakFit
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based peak-fitting tool for spectroscopic data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool designed for fitting peaks in spectroscopic data, facilitating the analysis of spectral features.

tools.name: Alchromy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for spectral deconvolution of UV-Vis waveforms
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed for the spectral deconvolution of UV-Vis waveforms, aiding in the separation of overlapping spectral signals.

tools.name: sgolayfilt
tools.one_line_profile: Savitzky-Golay differentiation filters implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Savitzky-Golay differentiation filters, commonly used for smoothing and differentiating data in signal processing and spectroscopy.

tools.name: scikit-spectra
tools.one_line_profile: Pandas-based toolkit for explorative spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit built on pandas for explorative analysis of spectroscopic data, with a particular focus on UV-Vis spectroscopy.

tools.name: IDSL.IPA
tools.one_line_profile: Intrinsic Peak Analysis pipeline for large-scale metabolomics peak picking
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for peak-picking in large-scale untargeted small molecule analysis, including metabolomics and lipidomics, developed by the Integrated Data Science Laboratory.

tools.name: pyampd
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Automatic Multiscale Peak Detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An improved Python implementation of the Automatic Multiscale Peak Detection (AMPD) algorithm for identifying peaks in periodic or quasi-periodic signals.

tools.name: peakipy
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive NMR peak deconvolution tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed for interactive deconvolution of NMR peaks, assisting in the analysis of complex NMR spectra.

tools.name: nmrglue
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for working with NMR data
tools.detailed_description: A robust Python module for reading, writing, and processing NMR data, supporting various file formats and processing functions.

tools.name: PyWaveletPeakID
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet-based positive peak detection for 1D data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing wavelet-based methods for detecting positive peaks in one-dimensional data streams.

tools.name: xcms-gnps-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for integrating XCMS with GNPS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R utility functions to facilitate the use of XCMS preprocessing results within the GNPS molecular networking ecosystem.

tools.name: xcms4gnps2
tools.one_line_profile: XCMS-based preprocessing workflow for GNPS2
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing XCMS-based preprocessing workflows for LC-MS/MS data, specifically tailored for feature-based molecular networking (FBMN) with GNPS2.

tools.name: ecg-baseline
tools.one_line_profile: ECG signal baseline filtering library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for baseline filtering of ECG signals using Savitzky-Golay, Zero-phase Butterworth, and Wavelet filters. While domain-specific to ECG, the methods are applicable to general signal processing.

tools.name: cpc
tools.one_line_profile: Characterization of peaks detected by XCMS
tools.detailed_description: A package designed to characterize peaks detected using separate peak detection methods, with current support for XCMS preprocessing output.

tools.name: prospectr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing and sample selection of spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing miscellaneous functions for preprocessing spectroscopic data (like derivatives, smoothing) and selecting representative samples.

tools.name: OpenMS (LANL)
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale solvers for coupled Maxwell-Schrödinger equations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of multiscale solvers for coupled Maxwell-Schrödinger equations in open quantum environments, developed by Los Alamos National Laboratory.

tools.name: PeakDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time peak detection algorithm for Arduino
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for real-time peak detection using z-score algorithms, optimized for embedded systems like Arduino but applicable to general signal streams.

tools.name: savitzkygolay
tools.one_line_profile: Savitzky-Golay filters implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Savitzky-Golay filters for data smoothing and differentiation, maintained by the Leifer Lab.

tools.name: NSC
tools.one_line_profile: Nyström-based spectral clustering for LiDAR tree segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Nyström-based spectral clustering with K-nearest neighbour-based sampling for individual tree segmentation from airborne LiDAR point cloud data.

tools.name: SavitzkyGolay.jl
tools.one_line_profile: 1D Savitzky-Golay filter in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia language implementation of the 1D Savitzky-Golay filter for signal smoothing and differentiation.

tools.name: NMR.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for NMR spectroscopy in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing tools for the processing, simulation, and analysis of NMR spectroscopy data.

tools.name: chemometrics
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for chemometric data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing various algorithms and tools for chemometric data analysis, including multivariate analysis methods.

tools.name: AMPD-algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Multiscale-based Peak Detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Implementations of the Automatic Multiscale-based Peak Detection (AMPD) algorithm in multiple languages for detecting peaks in noisy periodic signals.

tools.name: openmpp
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to OpenM++ microsimulation platform
tools.detailed_description: A programmatic R interface to the OpenM++ microsimulation platform, allowing users to run and analyze microsimulation models.

tools.name: OpenMSFTL
tools.one_line_profile: Research simulation toolkit for federated learning
tools.detailed_description: A research simulation toolkit developed by Microsoft for experimenting with federated learning algorithms and scenarios.

tools.name: global-spectral-deconvolution
tools.one_line_profile: Global Spectra Deconvolution and Peak Optimizer
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library for global spectral deconvolution and peak optimization, part of the mljs scientific ecosystem.

tools.name: mljs/savitzky-golay
tools.one_line_profile: Savitzky-Golay filter in TypeScript
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript implementation of the Savitzky-Golay filter for data smoothing, part of the mljs project.

tools.name: savitzky-golay-generalized
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Savitzky-Golay smoothing and differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library implementing the General Least-Squares Smoothing and Differentiation by the Convolution (Savitzky-Golay) Method.

tools.name: ms_peak_picker
tools.one_line_profile: Peak picking library for mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to provide efficient peak picking functionality for software processing mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: OFF-PEAK
tools.one_line_profile: CNV detection tool for Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to detect Copy Number Variations (CNV) in Whole Exome Sequencing data, specifically focusing on 'off-target' reads to improve detection sensitivity.

tools.name: ramanbiolib
tools.one_line_profile: Raman spectral search library for biological molecule identification
tools.detailed_description: A library for searching and identifying biological molecules (lipids, proteins, metabolites, etc.) using Raman spectroscopy data against a database of 140 components.

tools.name: MZmine 3
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software for mass spectrometry data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for the processing and visualization of mass spectrometry based molecular profile data, supporting peak picking, alignment, and identification.

tools.name: MZmine 2
tools.one_line_profile: Previous version of the MZmine mass spectrometry processing framework
tools.detailed_description: The legacy version (v2) of the MZmine framework for differential analysis of mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: nf-core/diaproteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for quantitative analysis of DIA proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for automated quantitative analysis of Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) proteomics mass spectrometry measurements, including spectral library generation and statistical analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/mhcquant
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MHC eluted peptide identification and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline for identifying and quantifying MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data, specifically for immunopeptidomics.

tools.name: nf-core/proteomicslfq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for label-free quantification (LFQ) proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing label-free quantification (LFQ) proteomics mass spectrometry data, converting raw files to quantified protein lists.

tools.name: MWSG Spectrogram Enhancement
tools.one_line_profile: Spectrogram enhancement using Multiple Window Savitzky Golay filter
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Multiple Window Savitzky Golay (MWSG) filter for robust bird sound detection and spectrogram enhancement, as published in IEEE Transactions.

tools.name: ROCCO
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Open Chromatin Detection via Convex Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A multisample consensus peak calling tool for ATAC-seq data that uses convex optimization to robustly identify open chromatin regions across multiple samples.

tools.name: Shannon-Energy-R-Peak-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: R-Peak detection algorithm for EKG signals
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Shannon Energy Envelope method for detecting R-peaks in Electrocardiogram (EKG/ECG) signals.

tools.name: SpinPlots
tools.one_line_profile: NMR data plotting library based on NMRglue
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to simplify the visualization and plotting of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectroscopy data, built on top of NMRglue.

tools.name: OpenM++
tools.one_line_profile: Open source microsimulation platform
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and scalable open-source platform for developing and running microsimulation models, often used in epidemiology and social sciences.

tools.name: OpenMSIStream
tools.one_line_profile: Materials data streaming for laboratory environments
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework based on Apache Kafka for streaming materials science data from instruments to storage/analysis services, facilitating lab automation.

tools.name: peakdet
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for physiological peak detection analyses
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for processing physiological data (like ECG, EDA, respiration) to detect peaks and analyze signal characteristics.

tools.name: nmrfit
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative NMR analysis via least-squares fitting
tools.detailed_description: A tool for quantitative analysis of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectroscopy data using least-squares fitting techniques, developed at PNNL.

tools.name: savgol
tools.one_line_profile: Savitzky-Golay filters implementation in Ruby
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby implementation of Savitzky-Golay filters for data smoothing and differentiation, developed by Prince Lab (University of Toronto).

tools.name: pycroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific analysis of nanoscale materials imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing, analyzing, and visualizing multidimensional imaging and spectroscopy data, particularly for microscopy and materials science.

tools.name: HSID-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperspectral Image Denoising using CNN
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Spatial-Spectral Deep Residual Convolutional Neural Network for denoising hyperspectral images, as published in IEEE TGRS.

tools.name: raman_tl
tools.one_line_profile: Processing and plotting of Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for baseline correction, smoothing, processing, and plotting of Raman spectroscopy data.

tools.name: Raman-noodles
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Raman and IR spectra datasets
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing code and notebooks for the analysis, processing, and visualization of Raman and Infrared (IR) spectroscopy datasets.

tools.name: raman-spectra-decomp-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Decomposition analysis of materials using Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: Python code to identify components and calculate decomposition of materials using Raman spectroscopy data.

tools.name: LDCT Nonlocal Denoising
tools.one_line_profile: Low Dose CT Denoising using Non-Local Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Source code for noise conscious training of non-local neural networks for denoising Low Dose CT (Computed Tomography) images.

tools.name: IPO
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Optimization of XCMS Parameters
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated optimization of parameters for XCMS, a widely used software for processing mass spectrometry data in metabolomics.

tools.name: Savitzky-Golay-CPP
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of Savitzky-Golay Filter coefficients
tools.detailed_description: A robust C++ library for computing Savitzky-Golay filter coefficients, widely used for smoothing and differentiation of data in spectroscopy and chemometrics.

tools.name: GCPeakDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Peak detection for gas chromatography data
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB code specifically designed for detecting peaks in Gas Chromatography (GC) data.

tools.name: spinsolveproc
tools.one_line_profile: Library to process Spinsolve NMR experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing data from Magritek Spinsolve benchtop NMR spectrometers.

tools.name: lipyd
tools.one_line_profile: Lipidomics LC-MS/MS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for the analysis of lipidomics data obtained via Liquid Chromatography-Tandem Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS).

tools.name: MALDIquant
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative Analysis of Mass Spectrometry Data
tools.detailed_description: A complete analysis pipeline for MALDI-TOF and other mass spectrometry data, providing tools for baseline correction, peak detection, alignment, and visualization.

tools.name: MALDIquantForeign
tools.one_line_profile: Import/Export routines for MALDIquant
tools.detailed_description: A companion package for MALDIquant that provides functions to import and export mass spectrometry data in various standard formats (mzML, mzXML, etc.).

tools.name: EELSpecNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for EELS signal deconvolution and spectral reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for Electron Energy Loss Spectroscopy (EELS) signal deconvolution, featuring alignment-invariant processing and high-accuracy spectral reconstruction.

tools.name: AlpsNMR
tools.one_line_profile: Automated spectral processing system for NMR data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the automated processing of NMR spectra, including reading, preprocessing, and peak detection, specifically designed for untargeted NMR metabolomics.

tools.name: BSS-PLSR-for-Spectroscopy-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Blind Source Separation and PLSR framework for spectroscopy mixtures
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Blind Source Separation (BSS) and Partial Least Squares Regression (PLSR) for analyzing spectroscopy mixture data (Raman, FTIR) to identify sources and quantify concentrations.

tools.name: xcms
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for LC/MS and GC/MS data analysis and preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Bioconductor package for preprocessing high-throughput LC/MS and GC/MS data, featuring peak detection, retention time alignment, and identification.

tools.name: ms-peakonly
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based peak detection for untargeted metabolomics
tools.detailed_description: A high-level API and tool for peak detection in untargeted metabolomics mass spectrometry data using neural networks, based on the peakonly method.

tools.name: spectral
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for hyperspectral image processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing hyperspectral image data (imaging spectroscopy), providing functions for reading, displaying, and analyzing hyperspectral data.

tools.name: spectrapepper
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced processing and combinatorial analysis of spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the advanced processing and combinatorial analysis of various types of spectroscopy data.

tools.name: SpectroChemPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for processing and modeling spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework dedicated to processing, analyzing, and modeling spectroscopic data for chemistry, supporting various formats and processing pipelines.

tools.name: SPIKE
tools.one_line_profile: Processing program for FT-spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative development project for a Fourier Transform (FT) spectroscopy processing program, handling spectral data analysis.

tools.name: ukbnmr
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing Nightingale NMR biomarker data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing tools for processing and analyzing Nightingale NMR biomarker data specifically from the UK Biobank.

tools.name: PeakABro
tools.one_line_profile: Peaklist Annotator and Browser for metabolomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for browsing and annotating peak lists generated from metabolomics data, facilitating manual inspection and curation.

tools.name: QC4Metabolomics
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control systems for metabolomics studies
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and systems for performing quality control (QC) in metabolomics studies, ensuring data reliability.

tools.name: nmr_peak_picker
tools.one_line_profile: Automated peak picking for high-dimensional NMR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated peak picking in high-dimensional NMR spectra, addressing the challenges of complex spectral data.

tools.name: MSBrowser
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive dashboard for xcms peak picking parameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: An R Shiny dashboard for interactive visualization and fine-tuning of peak picking parameters in the xcms R package, supporting LC-MS and GC-MS data.

tools.name: drawnmr
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for NMR data in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A utility to draw NMR data in Jupyter Notebooks using nmrglue and bokeh, facilitating interactive data exploration.

tools.name: BEADS_Baseline_correction
tools.one_line_profile: BEADS baseline correction algorithm for chromatograms
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the BEADS (Baseline Estimation And Denoising with Sparsity) algorithm specifically for chemical chromatograms.

tools.name: DIMSpec
tools.one_line_profile: Database Infrastructure for Mass Spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: The Database Infrastructure for Mass Spectrometry (DIMSpec) project, providing tools and structure for managing mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: mzkit
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for mass spectrometry and metabolomics data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for processing NMR, MALDI MSI, MALDI single cell, Raman Spectroscopy, LC-MS, and GC-MS raw data, including chemoinformatics analysis and visualization.

tools.name: xcmsrocker
tools.one_line_profile: Rocker image for metabolomics data analysis with xcms
tools.detailed_description: A Docker image pre-configured with xcms and other tools for metabolomics data analysis, facilitating reproducible research environments.

tools.name: RWPD
tools.one_line_profile: Recursive wavelet peak detection and deconvolution
tools.detailed_description: An R package for recursive wavelet peak detection and deconvolution, likely designed for chromatographic or spectroscopic data analysis.

tools.name: airPLS
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline correction algorithm using adaptive iteratively reweighted Penalized Least Squares
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the airPLS (adaptive iteratively reweighted Penalized Least Squares) algorithm. It is widely used for baseline correction in spectroscopic data analysis (e.g., Raman, NMR, IR) to remove background noise while preserving peak information without requiring user intervention for peak detection.

tools.name: baselineWavelet
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet-based background correction for Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for intelligent background correction in Raman spectroscopy, specifically targeting highly fluorescent samples. It utilizes wavelet transforms to separate and remove broad background signals from sharp Raman peaks.

tools.name: libPeak
tools.one_line_profile: Peak detection algorithms for analytical instrument data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing methods for peak detection in data generated by analytical instruments (such as chromatography or spectroscopy). It includes algorithms to identify signal peaks, which is a fundamental step in quantitative and qualitative chemical analysis.
